subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Undeterred by the distraction and turmoil, Floyd Mayweather Jr. will put his unbeaten record (36-0) on the line Saturday night against Carlos Baldomir for the World Boxing Council welterweight championship.
snippet: Undeterred by the distraction and turmoil, Floyd Mayweather Jr. will put his unbeaten record (36-0) on the line Saturday night against Carlos Baldomir for the World Boxing Council welterweight championship.
